name: [SGP - 0001] Shimmer Community Grant Committee - Lead selection

questions.text: Which of these listed candidates should be the Lead of the Shimmer Community Treasury Grant Committee?

answers.additionalInfo: Read the application letter of the candidate here: https://govern.iota.org/t/jd-sutton-deepsea-program-lead-application/1438
Read the application letter of the candidate here: https://govern.iota.org/t/null-rafael-brochado-program-lead-application/1467
Read the application letter of the candidate here: https://govern.iota.org/t/application-grant-program-lead/1507

additionalInfo: You can only choose one candidate. Read the applications for the Committee Lead Positions here: [https://govern.iota.org/c/shimmer-governance-proposals/shimmer-community-treasury-coommittee-lead-appli/59](https://govern.iota.org/c/shimmer-governance-proposals/shimmer-community-treasury-coommittee-lead-appli/59)
